entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [libraries-jitstress] Failures in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.*Generic* #96464
    9.0.0
  • JIT assert on Unix in `ReturnTypeDesc::InitializeStructReturnType` #96461
  • ARM32 Year 2038 issue #96460
    Future
  • [ILVerify] Add option for validation of all dependencies #96458
    9.0.0
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitive generic operations for sizeof(T) < 4 #96453
    9.0.0
  • Vectorize several TensorPrimitive operations for double #96452
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: TensorPrimitives brought up to par with Math and generic math interfaces #96451
    9.0.0
  • [mono][perf] iOS Mono HelloWorld startup regression #96449
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][perf] Tracking #96444
  • Vector128.LessThan broken for some UIntPtr values on mono #96443
  • Trim embedded resource #96442
  • [ARM64] CINC or CSINC is not emitted for conditional increment #96441
  • [RISC-V] Update TODOs for RiscV64 Machine and Architecture in Crossgen2 #96438
  • [mono] io exception in thread will call crash #96437
  • CheckInterfaces is too permissive and not permissive enough #96436
  • [API Proposal]: JsonPolymorphic TypeDiscriminatorPropertyName Json Casing #96426

Closed

  • New SearchValues<string> API doesn't use vectorized equality comparison once it finds a candidate #96142
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: [System.DateTime] TimeProvider #96450
  • [wasm] JSImportExportTest.JsImportTaskTypes - System.ObjectDisposedException #93347
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Doesn't add methods to export-table via UnmanagedCallersOnly #96401
  • [perf] Overview of Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89238
    9.0.0
  • [TieredCompilation] Add tests for verifying that methods are jitted at appropriate tiers #11185
    Future
  • There is a delay bug in serial communication #74063
    Future
  • Test failure Exceptions/UnwindFpBleedTest/UnwindFpBleedTest/UnwindFpBleedTest.cmd #96391
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Warn when building C++/CLI tests not in a command prompt and don't try copying the files if we aren't in one #96465
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Ensure small counts are properly handled for sizeof(T) == 8 #96463
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add debug-only use of new AssemblyBuilder.Save in Regex.CompileToAssembly #96462
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [IGNORE] Testing `Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0` PR #96459
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • Expose DOTNET_JitDebuggable as a public configuration option #96457
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Build Mac symbols in .dSYM bundle, not single .dwarf file #96456
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Adding vectorized implementations of Log2 to Vector64/128/256/512 #96455
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Port loop unrolling to new loop representation #96454
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Recover from failed OCSP download. #96448
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Home float parameters before integer parameters #96439
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove defunct netfx tests #96435
    area-Meta
  • Add File.Exists check to LoadFromResolveHandler #96432
    area-System.Reflection
  • Test #96430
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: Allow hot/cold splitting between a `BBJ_COND` block and its false target #96431
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove arm64 neardiffer hack #96266
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add crossgen2 for riscv64 #95188
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Specialize by length in single-value SearchValues<string> #96429
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Update MicrosoftNETCoreCoreDisToolsVersion to 1.4.0 #96291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add generic overloads to TensorPrimitives #94555
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update coredistools #96286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Set false target for predecessor to first cold block #96412
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #96319
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Revert accidental changes merged with 95234 #96428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Manually optimize a rem 64 instruction to avoid regression on runtimes which do not currently optimize it (#96203)" #96415
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Clean up illink suppressions #96361
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix unhandled exception from foreign thread in new EH #96411
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix performance of System.Security. Cryptography.Tests #95310
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_IH_3A` to `SVE_JO_3A` #95994
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Updating Sum() implementation for Vector128 and Vector256 + adding lowering for Vector512 #95568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Further clean up loop alignment placement #95917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • KeyedCollection debug view doesn't work #96261
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Use auto thread dispatch in HTTP & WS #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • PGO: Profile Buffer.Memmove's length #96311
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE] Gshared mrgctx #96108
    NO-REVIEW
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Experiment: Minopts lsra #96386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • UInt64.CreateSaturating<Int128> truncates instead of saturates #96369
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [wip] [mono] Enable some of the disabled JIT/Directed/callconv/ runtime tests #96243
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Skip address for x64 prefix parsing #96375
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • [QUIC] Disable QUIC tests on CLR stress tests #96392
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Re-add Stack Overflow handling in NativeAOT with larger alternate stack #95808
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix idle HTTP/2 connection KeepAliveTimeout teardown #96158
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • Limit `PNSE` by using Invariant `SortKey` in `HybridGlobalization` #96354
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, needs-author-action
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Add osx RPATH in corehost #96367
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Introduce CallConvSwift and special register types to represent the Swift ABI calling convention #95065
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup some string operating functions #96099
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Precise reflection-visible delegate target analysis #96166
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow preinitializing `AppContext.TryGetSwitch` #95948
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution, needs-author-action

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Microsoft.NET.RuntimeIdentifierInference.targets incorrectly sets RID to win7-x86 / win7-x64 #35575
    9.0.1xx
  • [NETSDKE2E]Duplicate workload version info displays in dotnet --info of NET8 RTM SDK #35920
    8.0.2xx
  • Add flag for --workload-state when installing/update workloads for the old install behavior #34561
  • Solution filter files (.slnf) should be auto detected by `dotnet build` and `dotnet test` like .sln files #37742
  • warning NETSDK1004: Assets file '/root/.nuget/packages/system.threaing.tasks/4.3.0/ref/netstandard1.3/System.Threading.Tasks.xml not found #29659
  • `UseMSBuildTestInfrastructure` doesn't work for multi-tfm #37712
  • Error NU1301: `dotnet tool install` #37714

Updated

  • PackageInstall.Tests timeout known build error #36192
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Add "Who built this" to `dotnet --info` #37725
  • `wasm-tools` workload breaks `dotnet publish` in docker #32327
  • Improve workload list to work better with VS and other SDK bands #31283
    8.0.2xx
  • Support for new Workload Set Versions #35455
    8.0.2xx
  • Support workloads installed via Visual Studio from CLI `dotnet workload` commands #21811
    8.0.2xx
  • Workloads distribution and management is understandable and seamless for developers #30008
    .NET 8.0
  • Improve workload repair to actually fix a customers installation and manifests #31282
    9.0.1xx
  • NuGet Package can't find "latest" version #36637
  • Containers: extend environment variables for passing registry credentials #37606
  • AOT compile gives incorrect error about Roslyn source generator coming from a ProjectReference #37228
  • Workload installation failed: microsoft.android.sdk.windows::34.0.64 is not found in NuGet feeds https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json" #37580
  • `dotnet` should report .NET not MSBuild version #37713

PullRequests

Created

  • Add comment #37753
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37751
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #37750
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Provide new default for runtime identifier Fixes #35575 #36848
    Area-External, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #37251
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37715
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] [Blazor] Replace `webapp,razor` with `blazor` on `dotnet new` #37299
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.419 #37720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable TerminalLogger by default for .NET 9 SDKs #37492
    untriaged, breaking-change, Area-CLI, 9.0.1xx
  • Update branding to 6.0.322 #37719
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.127 #37718
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding and update the helix queue to osx 1200 #37726
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.313 #37722
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.102 #37724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.406 #37723
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.116 #37721
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing nullable reference types' warnings on invalid overrides #71477
  • Published package for the roslyn Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.LanguageServer feature #71474
  • Symbol - Static is not bold #71470
  • Show interface documentation #71469
  • IntelliSense feature request: Report references, which cannot be resolved (anymore) #71466
  • Automatically rename file while renaming containing type #71465
  • Action Command implementation under C# 8 #71463
  • Update DocumentationCommentId.CreateDeclarationId to return null instead of throw. #71460

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34503.99 #71475
  • "Request codeLens/resolve failed" error when using collection expression spread syntax #71339
    17.9
  • Whether a substring of a constant string within the scope of a constant should also be considered constants #71468
  • Add individual reference viewer for getter and setter in c# property #71467
  • Add options to disable automatically import "using static xxxxx;" #71464
  • Allow me to designate parameters as being regular expressions to gain syntax highlighting #71462
  • Interface constraints not used for generic interface covariance, leading to CS0266 #71301
  • Add option to "collapse declaration level within #regions when collapsing to definitions" #71450
  • Create a new Tools/Option tab for C#/VB Code Quality rules #30986
    Backlog
  • [API Proposal]:Attribute to execute the method at compile time #71438
  • Warn if a non-nullable field is used before it is set in the constructor #71437
  • Nullability warning when setting field from required property #71455
  • `()` is not parsed as empty tuple type in type argument list of method call #71378
  • Add the abbility to suppress CS1573 for a CancellationToken parameter #71356
  • Deprecate 'severity' field for IDE code style editorconfig syntax #44201
    Backlog
  • DiagnosticAnalyzer implementations need a syntax filter to exclude their overhead from unrelated light bulbs #55228
    17.6 P2
  • Add missing documentation for new IDExxxx code style analyzers #65757
  • Add documentation of IDE0120 #65758
  • Add documentation for IDE0240 #65765
  • Add documentation for IDE0241 #65766
  • MSBuildWorkspace doesn't raise warnings or errors if the app is targeting too low of a version of Roslyn #69578
    18.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [Inline Rename] Cosmetic improvements to Rename Suggestions #71478
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Cleanup code with patterns #71472
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix nested code actions in VSCode #71457
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fixes nested code actions in LSP bug #71456
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use SyntaxTree.GetDisplayPath in SARIF logger #71454
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Standardize use of prepareMachine for ci cleanup #71265
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Purge line commit information upon projection span reset #71471
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: handle spread iterator item with no conversion in IOperation #71461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2344197 #71453
  • Don't start the cohost server at all if Razor doesn't want to #71416
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Snap for 17.9 P3 #71445
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Snap main into 17.9 #71446
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • PR feedback and cleanup after solution-state/compilation-state refactoring. #71389
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Upgrade BCL assembly to 8.0.0 #71444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change MapCode protocol to match it's form in VS #71415
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use runtime helper `CreateSpan` for `stackalloc` of non-byte arrays #71261
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Run Spanish tests on CoreClr #67748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve parsing performance with large collection expressions of numbers #71443
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Collection expressions: tests for spreads of dynamic and non-generic IEnumerable collections #71158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Add handling of params collections for natural delegate types #71334
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Do not throw exceptions when we can't make a doc id #71451
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and package references #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: fix inline statement snippets in a "qualified name" edge case #71246
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Params Collections - Adjust binding in presence of dynamic arguments #71421
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Remove WPF dependencies from Workspace and Features test layers #71392
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bug fix #71403 #71420
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor WebApp] RenderMode InteractiveAuto and Could not reconnect to the server message #53120
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, connectionclosehttps, fortunes_ef #53115
  • Injecting DBContext in Validation Attribute randomly throws error: "Cannot access a disposed context instance" #53114
  • Create a .NET Upgrade Assistant extension for upgrading from Blazor Server and hosted Blazor WebAssembly apps to Blazor Web #53113
  • HttpRequest.QueryString not correctly build after decoding #53110
  • Implement QuickGrid.OverscanCount #53108
  • System.PlatformNotSupportedException: EventLog access is not supported on this platform #53106
  • Perf improvement: endpoint #53105
  • MapGroup with RoutePattern with RequiredValues of RoutePattern.RequiredValueAny registers incorrect URL routing endpoints #53104
  • Update SignalR TransportProtocols doc #53103

Closed

  • IIS AspNetCore Module V2 returns 10s of 503 error and "Failed to gracefully shutdown applicaiton" warning when recycling a Hello world demo #49350
  • Blazor Standalone Webassembly - Has no way to call Azure B2C edit profile user flow #53084
  • SignalR throws error on interface type method parameters (both client and server side) #53001
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #53069
  • quickgrid blazorwebassmelby with .net8.0 #53041
  • Corrupted Padding Bits Brotli Decode Blazor Azure Static Web App #52735
    8.0.x
  • Server-side Blazor perf infrastructure and hello world perf test #4052
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Synchronize Blazor WASM and Blazor Hybrid Perf Testing #42862
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Missing Microsoft.Cpp.Default.props #53112
  • How to bind a complex string type to Checkbox in Blazor? #53083
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot #52993
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52991
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot #52987
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #52986
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52981
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapipublishaot #52958
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapipublishaot #52894
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot #52866
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52865
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot #52859
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52858
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot #52852
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #52851
  • In ASP.NET 8, IReadOnlyCollection<> controller parameters do not bind from request body by default #52962
  • A way to modify prerendered page html #53044
  • Blazor Web App Client not registering a service/ DI not working #53042
  • NavigationException when attempting to navigate after submitting a form #49143 still continue #53040
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #53094
  • Perf regression: caching #53093
  • [Blazor] Disconnect alternative proposal #39409
    Planning: WebUI
  • Unexpected binding behavior (with addl side ?s) for Blazor docs #40798
    Planning: WebUI
  • [SignalR] Stateful reconnect #46691
  • SupplyParameterFromQuery triggers OnParametersSet after Navigation using AuthorizeRouteView #48241
    Planning: WebUI
  • [Blazor] Enhance navigation different interaction behavior #49210
    Planning: WebUI
  • Shouldn't the .NET 8 Blazor Web App template show client-server communication for WebAssembly SPAs? #52285
    Planning: WebUI

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Update other packages to bundle with rollup #53117
    area-blazor
  • Bump karma-sauce-launcher and saucelabs versions #53116
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Skip failing Libuv test on Alpine #52912
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, area-networking, 6.0.27
  • [release/8.0] Remove InvariantGlobalization in templates (#52428) #52461
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-mvc, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Fix Blazor enhanced form bugs #52765
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.2
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `76bb2af` to `dddb219` #53077
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.16
  • Update branding to 6.0.27 #53096
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.27
  • Update auto-milestones for Feb #53121
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Update branding to 7.0.16 #53097
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.16
  • Update branding to 8.0.2 #53098
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.2
  • Update SDK version #53101
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Switch to rollup for bundling #53095
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix misdetection of component comments #52744
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Pass dotnetEfVersion in Helix test runner #52103
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix deserializing null properties to Protobuf types #52468
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix reading null struct property value in gRPC JSON transcoding #52469
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix auto import of proto files when gRPC JSON transcoding is a transitive reference #52470
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix NavigationManager.Refresh() on SSR-only pages #52767
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix metrics duration and http.route tag with exception handling #52790
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-hosting, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix app_offline detection for some OSes #52810
    Servicing-approved, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix SSR page rendering intermediate state instead of the end state of components #52943
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix handling of default values in RDG #53047
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `76bb2af` to `dddb219` #53079
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Using FrozenDictionaries in IEndpointAddressScheme implementations #52854
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Annotate Http.Connections for trimming #52918
    area-signalr, linker-friendliness
  • Add polymorphic support to SignalR STJ #53035
    area-signalr
  • Use an image w/ node for SourceBuild #52969
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • [blazor][wasm] Remove legacy interop #52732
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, .NET 9 Planning
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread (Net9) #52724
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, .NET 8 Planning

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Picker doesn't show selected item on Android #19681
  • Android Switch Control Thumb Shadow #19676
  • Win: Disappearing event is not be occurred on the modal page when the second window close #19675
  • ToolbarItem icon/image doesn't update on page navigation on Android #19673
  • Unable to deploy maui app on ios #19671
  • [Windows] Issues with BoxView Placement Inside Border #19668
  • CollectionView contents not sizing correctly after orientation change #19667
  • Exception Occurs When Updating the Text of a Label Using Task.Run() #19666
  • App is not redirecting when the app opens from Intent.ActionSend action #19665

Closed

  • DataTemplateSelector not returning DataTemplate used with BindableLayout FlexLayout #7584
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Queries with `Take` are not cached properly by SQL Server provider #32712
  • Allow conventions to react to sequence operations #32709
  • Different LazyLoad/Proxies behavior with AutoMapper between EF6 and EF Core #32708

Closed

  • Using JSON columns for TPH inheritance #32242
  • I suggest a better way to work with Stored Procedure migrations #32316
  • Consider deprecating keyless entity types in favor of complex types #31439
  • Casting to 'SequentialDataReader' problem #32707
  • Renaming TemporalTable PeriodStart/PeriodEnd maps to incorrect value #32705
  • Investigate benefits of using UnsafeAccessorAttribute in EF Core #32656
  • How to manage adding/removal of properties to a class mapped to Json column? #32642
  • [Component Governance] vulnerability for Azure.Identity 1.7.0 #32608
  • How to remove children when DeleteBehaviour is set to NoAction? #32596
  • Change tracker ignores default value setting on non nullable properties #32565
  • Is it possible to configure to increment a property of an entity every time I call to SaveChages()? #32557
  • More than 2 Unions cannot be translated #32544
  • IMaterializationInterceptor on InitializedInstance doesn't have loaded included properties (child entities) #32535
  • System.AggregateException error after updating .Net and nugets packages #32531
  • EF should probe compatibility_level (for MS SQL) and translate appropriately #32528
  • is efcore 7 ro 8 supports BulkExtensions BatchUpdateAsync in a similar way #32527
  • SQLite Error 5: 'not an error' #32512
  • NullReferenceException in Get-Migration in EF Core 8 #32487
  • Cannot serialize Dictionary<string, string> in a JSON column #30707
  • Feature Request: LINQ to table parameter #13239
  • Test/Cleanup: some adhoc tests that are provider only because hardcoded column types etc can be moved from provider to relational/core #32570
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32714
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #32713
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Test for navigation naming from composite FK names #32711
  • Translate to NULLIF #32710

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Fix Contains within SQL Server aggregate functions #32543
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Allow empty inline collections (#32414) #32454
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Add method postfix when rewriting parameters for StartsWith/EndsWith/Contains #32440
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Allow opting out of new subquery translation for Contains #32434
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Create correct JSON reader/writer for double nested value conversions #32448
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Make ILazyLoader not IDisposable (#32345) #32463
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Cosmos: Generate ordinal values for key properties that used not to be persisted. #32489
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Infer type mapping suitable for concatenating two results (#32510) #32520
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Revert behavior to throw when attempting to modify an unconstrained alternate key property #32523
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Make proxies thread-safe accessing a navigation once loaded #32547
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Fix splitting migrations SQL by GO #32572
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Ensure that, by convention, dependent properties have the same element type as principal properties #32582
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Check value converter configuration source when setting element type. #32612
    Servicing-approved
  • Update branding to 8.0.2 #32704
  • Update branding to 7.0.16 #32703
  • Update branding to 6.0.27 #32702
  • Fix to #32570 - Test/Cleanup: some adhoc tests that are provider only… because hardcoded column types etc can be moved from provider to relational/core #32706
    auto-merge

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Visit inside InlineQueryRootExpression in nav expansion #32467
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Fix expression cloning when table changes in SelectExpression.VisitChildren #32504
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Improve the relationship cycle breaking logic to detect cycles even when not starting on one. #32598
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Preserve unicodeness and fixed-lengthiness in compiled model. #32683
    Servicing-approved
  • Feature/translate json functions #29306 #30010
    waiting-for-response
